question.title: Docusaurus Java Syntax Highlighting Not Working
question.body:
I have a Docusaurus project where I am trying to add support for Java syntax highlighting however, despite following the Docusaurus documentation, I was unable to get it to work.

So far I have tried adding java as a default language and have restarted the server (As specified in the documentation):

      // Inside docusaurus.config.js
      prism: {
        theme: prismThemes.github,
        darkTheme: prismThemes.dracula,
        defaultLanguages: ['java'],
      }

I have even gone ahead and checked that version 2.4 of Prism React Renderer supports java and it does. Not sure why this is not working. any help would be appreciated!
